text.tspan: Time is running. Do you have the time? Lunchtime.
Tick tock tick tock. Seven o'clock. Tick tock.
Did you see 23:23 on the alarmclock again?
In Tokyo it's already noon. But you are somewhere else.
Wake up, time for work. When is the meeting?
Are you late? What time is it? Snoozing polar bears.
4pm. The taxi is waiting. Scheduled plans.
In a way it's already December. Validate.
The summer is coming, but it's still spring.
Can't wait any longer. Cold storage required.
Early morning hacking. Infinitesimal loop iterations.
The milk expired while I read the newspaper.
A kiss as I left in the morning. Do you have the timetable?
Travelling to Nice, France. Bonjour I suppose.
13 hundred hours. Time flying. Is it bedtime yet?
Are we there yet? Killing time in Amsterdam.
